title: I dont't have a "Set a Club Tag" button there﻿
body: Is anyone having tha same problem? I have 5 members in my club, but when i go to "View your clubs and chat rooms" there is no "set a club tag" in my club... Can anybody help me here?

replies.body: We recently had some issues with Clubs and tags earlier today due to some back-end changes we made.  These changes indirectly broke some features with clubs and we are currently working on getting these resolved.  Just sit tight for now, we are looking to get everything resolved soon!

Don't know if it's just me but the issue is still in effect, thanks!
Rito, you guys need to nerf yasuo <3
yap...i can't find that button either...and i already have 5 members :/ i want that tag so bad....
I dont have the set a tag buttin on na
14th may 2016 no "Set a Slub Tag" button on EUW. {{summoner:3}}
Not sure if Riot still checks this post but I can confirm that the button doesn't appear on EUW
I am having the same problem as well, my PBE account has the button but my NA one doesn't yet it did yesterday.
Still dont have club tag button-EUNE
